```{r}
find_redundant_edges <- function(data) {
  edges_to_merge <- 
    data %>%
    dplyr::group_by(from, label) %>%
    dplyr::summarize(count = n(), .groups = "drop") %>%
    dplyr::filter(count > 1) %>% 
    left_join(data)
  
  untouched <- dplyr::anti_join(data, edges_to_merge)
  
  new_links1 <- edges_to_merge %>%
    select(-c(to, count)) %>% 
    rename(to = label)
  
  new_links2 <- edges_to_merge %>%
    dplyr::select(-c(from, count)) %>% 
    dplyr::rename(from = label)
  
  new_links <- dplyr::bind_rows(new_links1, new_links2) %>% 
    mutate(label = NA)
  
  dplyr::bind_rows(untouched, new_links)
}

# readr::write_csv(find_redundant_edges(a), file = "~/Downloads/test.csv")

merge_redundant_edges <- function(data){
  extra_edges <- find_redundant_edges(data)
  
  data %>%
      dplyr::filter(from %in% extra_edges$from,
                    label %in% extra_edges$label)
}
```
